attributes.action: For his abject failure, I am calling for a vote of no confidencein George Osbourne, Chancellor of the Exchequer
attributes.additional_details: For his handling of the economy, or rather lack of it, I would like a vote of no confidence to be called on his performance, or rather lack of it.  Whilst protecting the wealthy with a tax cut of 5%, those in the middle, and at the bottom continue to suffer as the cost of living continues to rise inexorably, as workers face pay freezes/cuts, and those most vulnerable and desperate to work are being hit the hardest thus driving many more millions into fuel poverty.  This winter alone has seen an estimated 11000 extra, and wholly needless deaths due to the cold weather, how many more must die whilst under the 'watch' of this ineffectual Chancellor?
